title: VFChain: Enabling Verifiable and Auditable Federated Learning via Blockchain Systems
summaries: proposed __a verifiable and auditable FL framework__ to ensure the correctness of training procedure
present an effective committee selection scheme based on the blockchain to collectively aggregate models and record verifiable proofs in the blockchain, which can provide the verifiability
propose a novel authenticated data structure for blockchain to improve the search efficiency of verifiable proofs and support a secure rotation of committee, which can provide the auditability.
